website_summaries.verdict: A durable microneedle derma roller that's perfect for those who are new to this practice.
pros: Prickly sensation, but doesn't cause extreme pain
Works on wrinkles and acne scars
cons: These 0.25-millimeter needles may not be long enough if you're looking for a more intensive product

customer_reviews.title: Great skincare on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Within two weeks, I saw noticeable results. I use every other day, even though it suggests once a week. I use the roller, vitamin C serum, and a light moisturizer. (I also take collagen and drink 100 oz of water a day.)
customer_reviews.author: Kell4music

customer_reviews.title: And I gotta say its amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting an amp roller for a while but didn't want to spend over a hundred dollars (rodan and fields). Turns out i found this and had to try it because of the reviews. And I gotta say its amazing!!! I didn't think it was working but I took pictures only 2 weeks ago and I definitely see results! I love it!!! Definitely recommend it!!😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Gavril

customer_reviews.title: Expensive dermaroller treatment WHO??
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised. The description said that it would help with indented acne scars. After suffering from cystic acne through my teen years, I was left with a few indented scars. I have been using this for about 3 weeks now and it is the best purchase I've made in a while. The scars are literally gone. Instead of using it once a week as instructed, I used it every other day and saw amazing results. I wish I had progress pictures, but I was so hopeless that I didn't want to bother taking a picture. If you need something to help with indented scars or acne scars overall, BUY THIS. You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Gisella Lopez

customer_reviews.title: MUST ADD TO FACIAL ROUTINE!
customer_reviews.text: MUST HAVE. I had just recently moved from NYC to LA & the change in temperature has been really affecting my skin; it’s been red, puffy and frequent breakouts occur. Day one of using this product: I started off my cleansing my face at night, then used the Sdara Derma Roller (which left my skin with a tingly, though not at all painful, sensation), and finally applied my moisturizers and serums that I could literally feel were being soaked into my pores. The next day, my skin had totally changed! After ONE use! I plan to use it once a week & highly recommend this gem to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: melbd

customer_reviews.title: Results in 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my derma roller for 2 weeks now and I am very happy with the results. I have used it once a week and use mad hippie vitamin c serum morning and night. My face feels moisturized and my acne scars have faded significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not use
customer_reviews.text: There’s something growing inside the dermroller. I don’t want to say that it mild but what else can it be. I just opened the product yesterday from its packaging and I didn’t use it because it looks like there’s something gross inside.
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Wray

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This product is the only thing that has ever worked on my acne scars!!!! My skin feels and looks AMAZING and I’m so happy i bought this product!!! The picture on the left is exactly 7 days ago before starting to use the dermaroller. On the right is this morning!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: BECAREFUL!
customer_reviews.text: it's your face. These rollers have stamped on knives not needles and such knives ruin your pores. Just avoid any derma roller . Don't believe me look into it! i have heard even some expensive dermarollers can be problematic. Just please look into it there are a few very important things that make a good derma roller. These are cheap as 3 dollars a piece if bought in bulk and is being sold for 20 dollars. So i remind you this is not a 20 dollar product it's a 3 dollar product.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Acne Scars be Gone!
customer_reviews.text: After only 1 use I can already tell a major difference in my face! I have had acne scars my whole life and this has been the only thing that has helped them. I followed up with Sdara vitamin C serum and was wonderfully surprised at the results this morning. I can't wait to see how my skin progresses over the next few weeks. The photo on the left was taken before bed and the photo on the right was taken in the morning. (No filter,no editing)
customer_reviews.author: KamKake

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, even though I followed instructions, it left some marks on my face and made a squeaky sound every time I used it. Too bad I can’t return it, such a waste of money. I saw the exact same one at Ross for 5$ . I wonder if the reviews were paid for !
customer_reviews.author: YARA

customer_reviews.title: but already I'm in love! I thought the small needles would feel more ...
customer_reviews.text: I've just started using this roller, but already I'm in love! I thought the small needles would feel more prominent when rolling, but in fact, it barely feels like anything. Roll each section/area of the face 4 or 5 times in every direction, and be sure not to overdo it - you could end up doing damage instead and leave yourself with splotchy broken blood vessels! I use The Ordinary's Hyaluronic Acid before and after rolling, and it helps give my skin the boost of hydration it needs. I definitely recommend this to anyone who's new or scared of the idea of derma-rolling!
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty good except after the 2nd time I used it the wheel keeps popping out and so now is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Irena Tabor

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waist your money on this. Splurge and get an authentic stainless steel dermal roller from an authorized retailer. This titanium roller did nothing for my skin except cause irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Damages skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with acne, however, it spread the bacteria all over my face and made my acne worse. When getting a facial, the esthetician could see the markings of this roller on my skin and told me to throw it away immediately. It was doing more damage to my skin. Unless these rollers are approved by a dermatology company, do not buy these rollers. There’s a reason why they are so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Little Miss Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: The Sdara brand has such good reviews so I'm sure I wont be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received my roller today and unfortunately what I received was not the Sdara brand. I am going to return the "knock-off" version and purchase directly from the Sdara website. The Sdara brand has such good reviews so I'm sure I wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: It has really helped!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I had used this product a while before reviewing. I’ve used it 5 times and love it. A couple of light sun spots are almost gone. I am 71 and have a few deep wrinkles so it will take a while on those. Overall I am very happy with the results so early on. I learned to press a little harder than I did at first. My face gets red but no blood. It’s fine a couple of hours later. I will definitely continue to keep this as part of my beauty routine.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Wilson

customer_reviews.text: Actually, Imitation is not good for the skin. The shape of the needle is more important than the number of needles. Unfortunately, this product isn't micro CONE-SHAPE needles. This is micro KNIFE-SHAPE needles. “knife shape” is the skin condition becomes worse. So I'm not recommend this product. For your reference → YouTube “DERMA~ROLLER for PLUMP Skin!! HOW TO!!”
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne A Wong

customer_reviews.title: Nickel allergic folks beware
customer_reviews.text: The roller works fine, says what it's supposed to do, and was very easy to use. My issue was with the needles. These needles contain nickel, so if you're sensitive to nickel DO NOT buy this product. I used it and I wanted to claw my face off within minutes. The itchiness and redness lasted for an entire day. Does anyone know of any derma rollers that are 100 percent stainless steel?
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I been using it for more than 4 month and not see any difference
customer_reviews.author: proudmom

customer_reviews.title: Can't afford Micro Needling? This is the product for you
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this derma roller! I bought it originally to see if a micro needling treatment would be the right option for me (trying to avoid wasting money!), and I've really been pleased with what I've seen. Okay, so I use this 1-2 times a week before bed/after I shower. I've found that this derma roller has helped bring old whiteheads/small pimples to the surface that have been there for months. I've been able to break up clusters of whiteheads in a matter of weeks! Additionally, it seems to be helping my hyperpigmentation. I've noticed those spots are lighter and easier to cover! Highly recommend if you are looking for a product to manage stubborn skin issues!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Volker

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was packaged beautifully and comes with a nice case. After just one use my husband noticed how my skin was glowing. I wash my face, let it dry and apply the derma roller gently all over my face followed by a serum and my new favorite moisturizer, LilyAna Face Cream Moisturizer. The results are truly amazing and for the price, a must have for remarkable skin.
customer_reviews.author: Helen GriffisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks; no results.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product 5 days per week for 2 weeks and have not seen any improvements. I wanted this mainly for uneven skin tones, scarring, small blemishes and I don’t notice any improvement in my skin color or texture. I use serum and renewing lotion in conjunction. From all the other reviews I expected to see at least mild improvements. I will continue to use with hopes I will see changes soon. But so far, this product has done nothing.
customer_reviews.author: KI Guy

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This product is AH-MAY-ZING! I was so nervous before to try it but I finally got it and it so NOT BAD AT ALL! I actually like doing it because it doesn't hurt. I was SO impressed when I received this roller it was sterile packaged and just very neat and clean looking. SO at that moment I was thinking, "OK...this is nice.....Im in!" I was NOT paid to write this review. I just want to help anyone who is interested in starting to want to take care of their skin; I highly recommend this as well as "BAE BODY GEL"
customer_reviews.author: Beauty L.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few weeks since I started using the roller and I use it two times a week. My skin is pretty tough and can handle it. My skin seems smoother and a little lifted. I’m in my 50’s and my skin was getting dull and losing some of it’s plumpness. I cannot believe how a simple tool can make such a big difference, but it does. I use it with a vitamin C serum and the initial results are good and I hope it continues to get even better.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin breakout horribly. Did not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac White

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I have heard great things about the derma roller. I haven’t used the item myself and I gave it a try! It wasn't as sharp as I expect. These bristles grabbed my hair when I use this. I had a twisted mess.
customer_reviews.author: Paulgu

customer_reviews.title: The needles are rusty!! UGH!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive my very 1st derma roller! After carefully selecting a reputable brand, based on reviews I selected Sdara. Unfortunately, I freaked out as I was immensely disappointed to see that the roller was brown & rusty! The packaging was beautifully done, I especially liked the clear case, but a rusty old roller? Come on!!! Why couldn't I be as fortunate as other satisfied customers posting good reviews?! It is absolutely disgusting & a huge turn off from wanting to use a derma roller now. To make it worse, this was an object I was going to put on my face!! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Stacykh

customer_reviews.title: Study before using.  You will love the results
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you know what you are doing before using this. You poking very small holes into your skin to stimulate collagen. You have to sterilize the roller very well. This is basically a sterile procedure. This .25 isn’t actually a long enough needle to start collagen production but start here. I will say I use this every 2 or 3 days and with this needle length the benefit is your moisturizer goes deeper. Don’t use chemical laden products. I use coconut oil or castor oil after my treatment and do it before bed. You shouldn’t use makeup for several hours because the makeup will clog your pores. Study a lot before using and you will be happy with results
customer_reviews.author: Joyce C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This is great device. I ordered 1.0 mm as my first one, but it was so much painful I decided to try smaller one. This one is great, hardly feel any pain, but, in my personal opinion, it is a bit short. So, next time I'll try 0.5 mm one. I ordered two, one from Amazon and one from their direct site, to compare. Because some people were saying that it is not original and I wanted to be sure. But they both were exactly the same, packing, tool, even the numbers on the box. The difference was the price, on Amazon it is faster delivery and about $7 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Stranger

customer_reviews.title: Great product and on top of that it’s clean and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Got the derma roller today and it looks good, the packing was clean and it was wrapped up and looked sterile. I was worried about the sterilization of the product. I tried it and it works!! I’m very glad I got this. All in all it works great! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: fang chen

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This thing felt pretty good the first time I used it. Then right after my skin was hot and red for hours. Thought I would give it another shot, and with every use it would get worse. I waited a week in between each use. Maybe my skin is just too sensitive for this one?
customer_reviews.author: Lori Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It came unsealed! As in open!
customer_reviews.text: This roller was supposed to come completely sealed in a sterilized pouch but it wasn't. The pouch was open and the box looked tampered with. This is extremely unsanitary and dangerous considering these are needles that penetrate your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not separate needles.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product, but THESE ARE NOT NEEDLES btw!! Which is why it gets 3 stars, it still does the job. But these aren’t separate needles which ladies, it’s not a good thing. Do the research and see why separate needles is the way to go. I didn’t know when I bought this, had I known I wouldn’t of bought this derma-roller. I ended up throwing this one out and buying a real needle derma-roller.
customer_reviews.author: JET44444

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. After one use I have a terrible rash on my cheek.
customer_reviews.author: Knot

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky and no directions.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and the packaging was good quality. The plastic is very lightweight and the roller had itself is very small. It does an adequate job. The roller is so squeaky it's annoying, and the unit arrived with no directions whatsoever. I did YouTube these rollers for directions. I would look for a better quality roller.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: The only way i would buy again is ONLY to use for my stomach did horrible for my face😞😔
customer_reviews.text: At first i loved it then after a while i just stopped using it. Maybe it's just not for my face i have very sensitive skin this product made my skin irritated it scratched up my skin slightly & just overall made me feel digusted. My face burned & was EXTREMELY RED!! I am puertorican & black my skin tone is light brown people would say I'm a "high yellow" when i tell you my face was beet red beleive me when i say it was the most uncomfortable thing ever! I did use it for my belly since i have 3 kids & i have stretch marks it seemed to work better on my stomach than my face.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: A waste of your money but excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this believing it would give me the effect that I received in a session with the plastic surgeon. It is an inexpensive facial item that lives up to the old saying “you get what you pay for”. The company read this review and credited back my card for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: ba p mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this Derma Roller
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this Derma Roller. I purchased it a month or so ago and use it twice a week. After I use the roller, I follow with a hyaluronic mask for 20 minutes, then spread on Vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, and retinol serums. Wow, what a difference ...in just a month's time my skin looks fantastic. The fine lines on my face have been reduced and my skin looks and feels smooth and bright. And I' ve received a ton of compliments on how great my skin looks. This is definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: no difference after months of use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for months... I've used daily and ive used once a week. There is no difference in my skin. In fact, my skin looks better immediately after I use it probably because it is a little puffed up and swollen but it's also very red. I drink double my weight in water each day. I exercise and eat well. I use a good skin regimen as well. I have melasma spots and wrinkles. I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving this three stars because I was super excited to try it after reading through the comments
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this three stars because I was super excited to try it after reading through the comments! However, soon as I tried it, my skin flared up and is super red and almost creating a rash. I'm currently typing this in front of a fan trying to cool my face down, even though I put the serum on after rolling. I'm going to try this for two weeks and if this keeps happening I'll return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands and versions of derma rollers and this one is by far my favorite. Great quality and great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great product! I've only used it a few times, but so far so good! Comes in a clear case for storage, that I've found is great for drying after sanitizing as well. If you flip the roller over it rests with the head elevated. I use this in combination with a Vitamin C and Hylauronic Acid serum to help fade acne scars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed product
customer_reviews.text: If there is 0 star I would give. What a bad product, I received unsealed product without the plastic bag on the case which looked used and there is needle scratch on the plastic container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a Dermaroller before but I have heard all the great benifts of them so I gave it shot, so far it's been showing great results. It doesn't hurt, don't be afraid to apply pressure. Just make sure to ALWAYS sterilize the instrument before and after each use. I use 91% rubbing alochol, seems to work just fine. Don't forget to apply a serum to your skin afterwords. Good luck! hope your results are as good as mine xoxo
customer_reviews.author: Heather f.

customer_reviews.title: BYE BYE STRETCH MARKS!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this product to use on my stretch marks. After baby #2 I was covered and they were unsightly. They were deep and dark. I started using this roller and wow.... I AM A BELIEVER! My stretch marks are not only super faded, my skin healed so much softer and less saggy. This roller helped my skin repair itself! I would reccomend it for anyone who has given up hope to ever having smooth skin again. This roller saved my skin!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Firth Fountain

customer_reviews.title: Useless, painful and unhygienic
customer_reviews.text: Made no difference and honestly felt pretty unhygienic by the third use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped rolling after 3 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened. I have only used it 3 times and liked it. Went to use it today and it is very hard to roll. You have to push very hard to roll. I obviously don’t want to push needles hard in my face. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Annabel lee

customer_reviews.title: Like the concept, not the aftermath
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product for at least a month (once a week application) and it's left my neck area very itchy with red splotches. Not sure how beneficial this product is, for me at least. Not sure if the products I applied afterward were more absorbed into my skin as it mentions in the description. I can't return it since the 30 day period has expired however I'm going in for a professional chemical peel instead. The particular device I have squeaked the entire time I used it (so annoying)! Felt very flimsy too.
customer_reviews.author: SSJ

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this product- I've had derma rollers before that I LOVED. Saw a blogger post this and decided to try it. Not sure if mine just had a defect, but it had random needles sticking out further than others that literally scratched my face all over.
customer_reviews.author: KEC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised. I have been looking for a derma roller for ages and settled on this It's a great first derma roller, use it 2-3 times a week and have noticed a big difference in my acne scarring and wrinkles only a few weeks in. Such good value. It is also easy to use and clean as well. You can use alcohol to clean it. recommend purchasing with it.
customer_reviews.author: College

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely unbelievably amazing. I have never had a product give such amazing and fast results!!! A little nerve-racking at first but once you get the hang of it, this roller is just life changing! After one single use I noticed my dark spots and acne scars were lighter and less noticeable. I use this at night after washing my face and then follow with a vitamin C serum and a lightweight calming moisturizer. I look forward to waking up the next day to see the difference! Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at first but this product has done wonders for my skin. I have deep scars and over the past few months it has made them so much less noticeable. If you're like me, your scars are also darker than the surrounding skin. So I use the roller about every 2 weeks, then but vitamin D & lotion on immediately after. The derma rolls will smooth out the skin and the vitamin D can get deep in the skin to fix the hyper-pigmentation! I've been very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Beware Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I followed the prescribed instructions and used medical-grade alcohol cleanser on the apparatus, prior to use. After first-time use, I broke out in small red bumps/papules. It took approximately 1 week for these lesions to heal. No noticeable effect after bumps disappeared. Have not used roller again. Would not recommend for use on all skin-types.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin&Hobbes

customer_reviews.title: How did I live so long without one of these?
customer_reviews.text: This roller is the best! It is so easy to use and your lotions and serums go on sooooo much better after using it. Wash your face with your preferred cleanser and roll away! Then put on your favorite cream or serum. It makes it epically more effective. I can see fine lines are disappearing and my pores are much more clear. My chin always breaks out at "that time of the month" and no break outs after incorporating this little gadget in my routine. **I always clean it with 90% rubbing alcohol after every use. You obviously don't want roll bacteria all over your face!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loo

customer_reviews.title: Great for scalp/alopecia!
customer_reviews.text: I recently read an article about micro needling and alopecia and how many people were experiencing great results. At the end of the article, they suggested derma rolling + triamcinolone cream as a more cost-effective option. I have been struggling with alopecia for 18 years and at this point, am willing to try anything. I immediately jumped on Amazon to order this derma roller for my scalp! I have been using this for several weeks and am already seeing some regrowth in areas I haven't seen in a long time! This roller is great quality and it comes in a sealed package- super clean! Highly recommend this product and this practice for anyone with alopecia/hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Nell

customer_reviews.title: Love the roller! Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use this every other day with a Hyaluronic acid serum, regenerist micro sculpting cream, and a collagen moisturizer. I have very dry skin, large pores, and redness. I have seen a huge improvement since starting to use the dermaroller and the above products. My husband is even amazed! I will continue to use it. My skin just drinks up the products I use after rolling!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes big holes in your skin
customer_reviews.text: At first I was so excited but I have noticed that the holes are staying in my skin and not going away? That doesn’t seem like a good thing
customer_reviews.author: Misti D Houston

customer_reviews.title: Needling up my face and glowing the next morning.
customer_reviews.text: Read a pro tip to put serum on before, then roll, then put more on after. MY SKIN IS GLOWING! The fine lines showing up between my brows like don't exist anymore and the lines across my forehead are fading. Guys get this it rly works!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Never going to a medspa again!!
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS and am African American. I have suffered from cystic acne and scarring for YEARS! I use this every day and use witch hazel, vitamin E oil, aloe Vera and tea tree oil in a spray bottle after rolling my face and... omg my indents are GONE! I am glowing and I threw away my foundations and now use a tinted moisturizer. This thing is a miracle worker and I am GLOWING!!! I use this every other day though. My face was mortifying. Now it’s slowly getting better after using the roller for about 3 weeks now!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: If you want less smooth skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't see much of any benefit after using this for 3 months. If anything, I see more pores, like the needle just gave me more pores.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Too early to say for sure but so far I like it
customer_reviews.text: I keep getting reminded to leave a review but I've only used this implement once! There's nothing to dislike and I'm convinced of the science so it will just take time to see results. Will update this review after several weeks of use (I plan to use just once per week, meshed into an existing beauty curriculum including herbal steam treatment, sugar scrub exfoliant, indian clay mask and Vitamin C serum).
customer_reviews.author: Cedar Abadie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these from Rodan and Fields that cost over $75, and this one works as wee, if not better. Highly recommend saving the $ and going with this one! I am 43 and have been a smoker for 30 years. Have been moisturizing since I was 11 and that has helped a lot, but lines were beginning to show more. Between my R&F face products and this roller, I am still mistaken for early 30's. :) I'll take that!
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Matte paint finish looks great but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second derma roller I bought from this seller. I was so happy with first buy that I decided to buy their newly improved roller. The new 2.0 needle penetrate better. However, I felt a tug on my skin while rolling it on my face which the first roller do not. There's definitely a problem with the needles. Old version have better case and the matte paint finish is peeling off after cleaning and sanitizing it with alcohol. I took pictures but I couldn't find an upload button.
customer_reviews.author: DSmith

customer_reviews.title: Great job, small price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used a Derma Roller before, so I have nothing to compare to. However, this roller seems to work really well. It’s easy to use and has a nice storage case. I’ve only used it two times but I can honestly say that I’ve noticed a difference in my skin tone after using each time. My face seems brighter. I think that my face is also getting clearer because of the microneedles opening up my pores so that my serum and toner can get deeper into my pores. All in all, the price is fair and I feel that it does a great job! I will be ordering my replacement from Sdara Skincare when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great product a must get results after one use !
customer_reviews.text: A must get and a lot less expensive than many other micro-needling tools out there I attached a before and after picture I’m 44 years old and in one application I already saw a difference especially under my eyes and on my hyper pigmentation and very easy to use the best product! You do not need to press the roller on your skin let the roller glide and it’s a very soft scratchy feeling it shouldn’t be anything other than that that means you’re pressing too hard I even did this on my neck
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No one was more shocked than me that this works
customer_reviews.text: Holy witchcraft, this works. I have had ice pick acne scars for over 30 years. I thought I had accepted them but after a week of using this, my skin is better for the first time in my life.
customer_reviews.author: caroline livorno

customer_reviews.title: Skin therapist approved !!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a skin therapist and was skeptical about an at home microderm tool. This is great! After the first few uses I noticed an overall smoothness. I now do this around 1x a week with a bit more pressure and follow up with hyaluronic and a strong moisturizer. Definitely worth but. I have an overall smoother and brighter appearance to my skin
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.text: I’ll give it a 3 stars at the moment! Used it for the first time, it feels weird having needles being roll onto your face. However, after using this derma roller and applying both my own moisturiser & face oil, my face definitely feel different than usual the following day (in a good way)! Will definitely try it out for a month and see the results! Side note: It does make my face a little itchy after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeshere

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great results!
customer_reviews.text: I had never done any micro needling before so was a little apprehensive as I have very sensitive skin. It was the combination of the needle length and the number of needles and the fact that they are titanium that made me choose this product and I am so glad I did. I have only been using it for a couple of weeks (I use it twice a week) and I can see the difference in my skin already. Will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this once and had NO issues. Seems to work fine. Will continue to use weekly and hope that it will help my skin as it is said to do. No problem with the transaction and the vendor was outstanding with customer service through the entire process. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JMatt

customer_reviews.title: Microdermabrasion at home
customer_reviews.text: I've used this instrument for only a week and plan to use it 2 or 3 times each week. It's a nice pickly sensation with a minimal pressure. I cleanse my face, use the roller, rinse my face and apply moisturizer. It's too soon to really notice a difference but surely the micro procedure allows the moisturizer to penetrate deeper and that's what I want it to do. Well worth the price and so easy to use. I've had something similar as an office microdermabrasion procedure and I know this isn't as effective but with continued use I'd expect similar results.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Akin

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product for a Lower Price than Many Others.
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a much more expensive derma roller and found no discernible difference between this one, which is excellent, and the more expensive one. Both also had good instructions and storage cases. Definitely 5 *****.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for exfoliating. I had this professionally done and decided to buy and do it myself. Super simple and worked just like the pros. I liked this unit as the head it replaceable. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels SO soft
customer_reviews.text: I am 22 years old and have recently been interested in microneedling. This product was the perfect start to learning more about skin care and how to take better care of my own. I would absolutely do your research before using the product because there are certain things to do before and after. I started out by washing my face with a gentle cleanser, put alcohol on the derma roller to prevent the spread of bacteria, put moisturizer on, and dipped it back in alcohol. (check out a YouTube video if you want more information). The next morning my face felt refreshed, oil free, and much brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Dodge

customer_reviews.title: It's mostly marketed as a way to fill in fine lines, but EVERYTHING claims to do that
customer_reviews.text: The biggest change I've noticed is in evening out my complexion. It's mostly marketed as a way to fill in fine lines, but EVERYTHING claims to do that. I've always had issues with blotchy red skin, especially during winter. I use this right after getting out of the shower and before putting on any lotion. It's made a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergic to the Needles
customer_reviews.text: The first two pics are the before and the second two are after three weeks using it about twice per week. Using it was easy and it seemed to help my skin absorb the products I applied after. But my skin was really irritated and itchy after each use for about an hour. I think that is due to the material of the actual needles. I’m very sensitive to certain metals and I have to buy gold or surgical steel jewelry. I didn’t think about that before buying this but for anyone who has the same issue with types of metal I would stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: After a month of use, I don't see a difference
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would help me with my deep acne scars, but honestly I can't say it changed anything. I don't know, maybe you need to use it for a longer period? Maybe for deep scars you need larger needless? In any case, I stopped using it because it felt like I was hurting myself for nothing :( I guess there's so much you can do at home with deep scars...
customer_reviews.author: shir

customer_reviews.title: Life Changer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product feeling a little hesitant because of the thought of putting needles on my face but it worked out better than what I thought. I had little dents on the side of my nose and after a couple weeks of using the roller, they went away. This product helps any breakouts I may have heal faster or even make them less swollen. I clean it before using it with alcohol for sterilisation and use them on my arms and face and I can't complain. They've helped improve my overall skin texture after a couple months of using it. If you're having doubts, trust me and buy it. You wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Perez

customer_reviews.title: Immediate results!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and it was surprising to know that this product did not cause major sensitivity. The needle roller is relatively gentle (its kind of the same feeling as doing your eyebrows with a Tweezer) however, as days passed, I used more pressure adjusting the amount of discomfort I am able to handle (sort of say). When used around eyes its eye-tearing, but nothing serious. I love this product, within two weeks of using it, I noticed my skin softer, smoother, and very glow-e!
customer_reviews.author: Joa

customer_reviews.title: I have my fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.text: I learned about these while researching remedies to cure baldness. I have alpha thallasemia and I receive regular blood transfusions so I have severe alopecia on certain areas of my head mainly my sides and crown. I am way too embarrassed to leave a pic lol but I will if this thing works so wish me luck! I used it after cleaning with alcohol and as weird as it may sound, my head started tingling like seriously! I'm NaShayla Al Haqq on Facebook btw!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Haqq

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I almost never like to write a review... Even if I didn't like it so much the products that I've bought,I'd try not to... But the derma roller RUINED my face. I can't tell how terrible it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Derma Roller
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a product like this before but so I don’t have anything to compare it too. I will say, I did a lot of research before purchasing this one and I have no complaints so far. It takes some getting used to the feeling on your skin but that is just using the right pressure. I use it once a week. It is well made and prefect size for the face. Don’t be lazy about sterilizing it.
customer_reviews.author: Catkittypurr

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: It actually works. Perfect product. I can't thank enough whoever was brilliant enough to come up with this idea. That being said, you still must do your research. There is a lot of information out there. It is easy to get this wrong and use it improperly. This can lead to some serious, irredeemable damage. Study sufficiently. There are plenty of YouTube videos on the subject. And ensues amazement.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. I've used this 4 times now and see no difference but I'm sure it'll take a while from what I've read about dermarolling. Product is great though. For only being .25mm it's more uncomfortable than I would have thought, your skin feels like it has a medium sunburn after. I wish this company made a 0.5 version! Good quality (540 titanium needles) 0.5mm have been difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this with Perfectly Posh products to microneedle my face/neck once a week. I have had the same roller since March (now September) [I know, it's recommended to be replaced every month] with my only complaint being that the roller now squeaks when used. This is probably from the moisture - I sanitize the roller with rubbing alcohol before and after each use. The roller arrived on time and undamaged as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be light in your skin no rough pressure
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this because it looked really nice and sturdy but once you're rolling it on your face its weird the tiny needles work but its the rolling that is off . I feel it shakes too much . Not sure if mine has a defect or thats how its meant to be im scared to use it because of the uneven rolling. I like the packaging is really nice i kept it for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get hopes to high
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item thinking I would see changes like everyone else. I have acne scars and ice pick scar but not very deep. I use the products every other day because my skin has been tolerating it pretty well. But I see no changes what so ever. My roller feels so dull at a certain spot to the point as I roll and then rough at a certain spot. I really don’t think this is working for me and I’m starting to lose hope because I really want to get rid of these hyperpigmentation marks , acne scars and ice pick scarring. Wish I could of gotten my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next time, I'll pass.
customer_reviews.text: Check out the lighting in the photos that report great results for acne scars.. The photos are taken under different lighting. As far as the rave reviews? I know, I know, we're all hopeful to find that cure-all... I recommend watching Dr. Davin Lim's explanation on microneedling. It's available for free on youtube. There are a lot of dermatologists and chemists on youtube with good information on skincare. I won't be repurchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: A must buy, great for at-home use. Easy to clean. Remember when using this product to roll then pick up and roll again. Do not roll back & forth on skin... Huda Beauty has a great tutorial explaining this!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product - Amazing Company!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me and I love it! I use it twice a week, and I apply my favorite serum after. What a great combination! And their customer service is like nothing I've seen! It's a good feeling knowing you're always taken care of :) THANK YOU Christina and the Sdara Team! You've got a customer for life :)
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Gives a healthy glow to skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little gadget. I didn't expect it to do much, but it helps give you a refreshed look. I only use it once a week on Friday night so I look better on Saturday. I just clean it with alcohol and wash my face. Then I run it over my entire face and go over my wrinkle areas several times. I put on a vitamin C serum and then in the morning my face looks brighter and less wrinkly. I will be purchasing another one when this one gets dull.
customer_reviews.author: loreleigal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing short of amazing! Even though this product received very good reviews, I was skeptical about using it on my very, very sensitive skin. I tried it out on a weekend just in case I ended up with breakouts/rash. Nope! My skin looked absolutely amazing immediately after needling. I washed my face, rolled the derma roller up and down, back and forth (like painting) for about 2 minutes. Applied a restoring serum and watched my skin glow! I have old acne scars and discoloration on my cheeks, this has significantly reduced the redness and indented marks. I’m so happy!!
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Good for young skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this roller to help accelerate collagen and cell turnover in my skin. I do know these rollers are great for allowing moisturizers to penetrate at a deeper level. This roller would be perfect for someones skin that has not seen the sun or for someone in their twenties. My skin however did not do well with it. I will order a roller with different needles.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Unboxing and trying for 1st time
customer_reviews.text: Packaging is nice. Came wrapped in a sealed clear bag like a surgical tool. I did not apply much pressure as I slid it over my face. Wheel is a little squeaky but it rolled just fine. No pain at all but you can feel the tiny pricks. I rolled it up and down first then horizontal like a tic tac toe pattern. A few spots on my face are a little itchy but I think that may be the serum I put on my face afterward?? More specifics to come...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: N LOVE
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING.......My friends were complementing how amazing my face looked asked what I been doing. It Minimized my pores so much and the overall complexion and appearance of my skin is just glowing. Everything about this product was absolutely amazing. I used it twice a week And a total of 4 times. Typically I completely wash my Face with a gentle scrub, Use the Derma roller and then apply Coconut oil. And no make up for 24hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Order was shipped quickly, and a follow up email sent on how to use the product, which was a nice surprise. I only used it once and my skin looked better, except I should have not done around the eyes. They say to use 3 times a week which I will be doing. My main concern is acne scarring, if this will work on that it will save me $1200 going to a dermatologist to have professional microwneeding. Oh and yes DON"T go out into the sun. I was sitting out a bit this weekend on my lanai and I don't usually burn, but my skin was sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for some time, purchased it in January and have used it once a week. First off I don't believe it actually does anything other than induce inflammation on your face which might confuse us with a smoother looking complexion. Also, the squeaking sound that it makes is super annoying and irritates the heck out of my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this Derma Roller, excellent.  The Micro Needle at .25mm is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I've been an Esthetician for years. This product gets the job done without excessive pain. It really works and putting on vitamin C after using it makes a big difference. If you get a tingle from the vitamin C . . . that's a good thing, showing you that the product is going into the dermis. I've tried OTHER Derma Rollers before (the needles were too large) and they hurt too much, so I wouldn't continue using them. This one was perfect in every way - even green my favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kay

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Such a awesome product! Telling all my girlfriends about this! Love the price and even though I am new to the derma roller scene, I am impressed with how my face felt after just one use. I have some pregnancy acne scars that are 10 years old and I really feel like I saw a difference in them the morning after my first time using it I will be purchasing another one after reading you can use on your scalp for thin hair. Excited to try that!
customer_reviews.author: Ellasbombmom

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it works as intended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try and help grow my beard, I have patchy cheecks, and I want more hair to grow in that area, so I heard this is a good way to get the hair to grow, unfortunately either it didn't work for me, or I didn't use it long enough, but I saw no improvement. That's not to say this product doesn't work as intended, I didn't have any issues using it. It just didn't work how I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni S.

product_meta.title: Derma Roller Cosmetic Needling Instrument For Face, 540 Titanium Micro Needle.25mm - Includes Free Storage Case (1-Pack)
feature_bullets: A VISIBLE TRANSFORMATION – Don’t fret over wrinkles and large pores. Our press-loved derma roller promotes a luminous, youthfully vibrant and healthy-looking complexion.
SAFE AND PAINLESS – No need to fear. Our esthetician-recommended microneedle length (0.25mm) requires firm yet gentle pressure to maximize usage and minimize discomfort.
LONG-LASTING PAYOFF – When used correctly and regularly with the high-quality topical products, your skin will continue to look its most beautiful for as long as you use it

AFFORDABLE QUALITY – Professional microdermabrasion sessions cost hundreds if not thousands of dollars (plus hours at the clinic). With consistent use, you can the quality for less than the price of a week’s worth of lattes!
OVER 400,000 HAPPY CUSTOMERS – The proof is on the glowing faces of our customers. Check out the customer reviews and images to see for yourself.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
